Homework

These assignments will be due by 5:00 pm on the specified due date. These may be turned in during class or brought to my office.

All homework problems must be done on your own. Late homework must be scanned to a single PDF file and turned in by email to the professor. Late homework will lose points based on the following schedule:

  • 1 minute to 24 hours – 10%

  • 24 hours to 48 hours – 20%

  • 48 to 72 hours – 40%

  • over 72 hours – no credit
